WYSIWYM.model
Class QueryEdge

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Edge
      WYSIWYM.model.SGEdge
          WYSIWYM.model.QueryEdge
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, TreeComponent
public class QueryEdge
extends SGEdge

QueryEdge in an edge in the QueryGraph. It has a boolean operator, denoting whether it is part of a conjunction, disjunction, or is a denial or optional.

Version:
1.2 08-02-08
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

QueryEdge

public QueryEdge(String label)
Constructs an edge with the given label

Parameters:
label - Label

QueryEdge

public QueryEdge(String label,
                 int op)
Constructs QueryEdge with given label and boolean operator. Possible values for operator are 0 = conjunction (and), 1 = disjunction (or), 2 = negation (not).

Parameters:
label - Label
op - Boolean operator, int between 0 and 2
See Also:
QueryGraph

QueryEdge

public QueryEdge(String lbl,
                 int op,
                 QueryNode s,
                 QueryNode t)
          throws NameAlreadyBoundException
Constructs QueryEdge with given label, operator, source and target node ossible values for operator are 0 = conjunction (and), 1 = disjunction (or), 2 = negation (not).

Parameters:
lbl - label
op - Boolean operator, int between 0 and 2
s - source node
t - target node
Throws:
NameAlreadyBoundException - when this edge is already in the source or target node
See Also:
QueryGraph

Parameters:
edge - Edge to copy

QueryEdge

public QueryEdge(SGEdge edge)
Constructs a copy of the given SGEdge. If the edge is a QueryEdge, it also copies the boolean operator.

Parameters:
edge - SGEdge to copy
Method Detail

copyQueryEdge

public static QueryEdge copyQueryEdge(QueryEdge oldEdge,
                                      Map<String,SGNode> existing,
                                      SemanticGraphTransformer sg,
                                      SGNode source)
                               throws NameAlreadyBoundException
Constructs a copy of the given edge, and adds it with copies of the source and target to the Query Graph

Parameters:
oldEdge - QueryEdge to copy
existing - HashMap with nodes already copied (potential source and targets)
sg - Semantic Graph Transformer
source - Source of the new SGEdge, already copied
Returns:
copy of QueryEdge
Throws:
NameAlreadyBoundException - very unlikely

setOptional

public void setOptional(boolean o)
Sets whether this edge is an optional requirement. If it's part of an aggregation, the other edges should receive the same optional value.

Parameters:
o - true if this requirement is optional

isOptional

public boolean isOptional()
Checks whether this edge is an optional requirement.

Returns:
true if this requirement is optional

setSameOptionalValue

public void setSameOptionalValue(SGEdge[] edges)
Tells this edge which other edges are part of its aggregation

Parameters:
edges - SGEdge[] with other edges in its aggregation

setBooleanOperator

public void setBooleanOperator(int op)
Sets the boolean operator. Default value is -1; value can be set to 0 = conjunction (and), 1 = disjunction (or), 2 = negation (not).

Parameters:
op - integer between 0 and 2
See Also:
QueryGraph

getBooleanOperator

public int getBooleanOperator()
Returns the boolean operator. Default value is -1; value can be set to 0 = conjunction (and), 1 = disjunction (or), 2 = negation (not).

Returns:
integer between 0 and 2
See Also:
QueryGraph

getSameValueEdges

public QueryEdge[] getSameValueEdges()
Returns the other edges that are part of the same aggregation as this one

Returns:
SGEdge[] with other edges in its aggregation
